name: Hakai
description:
You've come to the Hakai region to seek fame and fortune. But according to the stories, you'll leave with neither. Hakai is one part breakout, one part pong, and one part RPG. Features:
  • 20+ levels of wild arcade action!
  • Upgrades!
  • 5+ song soundtrack
  • An odd storyline
Controls:
  • Arrow Keys / WASD to move the paddle and aim the sphere
  • Enter / space to release the sphere
  • Esc to pause the game
  • Enable mouse movement in the pause menu
  • Gamepad support
See you in the Hakai region! Pro Tips:
  • Press enter/ space after launching the sphere to increase its speed. This can be done multiple times. 
  • Moving the paddle up when the sphere contacts with it will propel the ball slightly upwards and vice-versa.
  • The faster the sphere is going, the more money you'll gain from each object destroyed.
  • A sphere moving diagonally has a higher chance to break through a wall.
  • Careful about upgrading attack as the sphere hurts you more as well!
